title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text: $$(0,0)$$ is a solution to $$y \geq \frac{-1}{2} x-3$$. Since $$(0,0)$$ is on the right side of the line, we shade the right side of the boundary line in red.\n##figure2.gif##
